page.title: 03A Day in the Life of Sharon
page.content: Page 2 After the break we start playing our instruments again until ll.45am, then we pack everything away and go to catch the bus. When I get home I have my dinner, which is usually fish and chips on a Saturday, then I go and have a look round the town. I have my tea at about 6.00pm, if the weather is nice I have a salad,then I watch the television. My bed time depends on what I want to watch. If there is nothing interesting I would go to bed at about 10.00pm, but I stay up later if there is something I particularly want to watch. This is a typical Saturday for me, Sharon James.
